title: Python Variable Voyage
description: Master the art of Python variables, from integers to strings, in this foundational adventure.

levels.title: First Assignment
levels.objective: Declare a variable named 'player_name' and assign it your name as a string.
levels.ai_hint_prompt: Remember to use quotes for string values.

levels.title: Number Crunch
levels.objective: Create two variables, 'score' with a value of 100 and 'bonus' with a value of 25. Then create a third variable 'total_score' that is the sum of the first two.

title: JavaScript Function Fortress
description: Learn to build and call functions in JavaScript to create reusable blocks of code.

levels.title: Hello, World!
levels.objective: Create a function named 'greet' that prints 'Hello, World!' to the console.

levels.title: Personalized Greeting
levels.objective: Modify the 'greet' function to accept a 'name' parameter and print 'Hello, [name]!'.

title: HTML Structure Spire
description: Climb the spire of web development by mastering the fundamental tags of HTML.

levels.title: The Main Title
levels.objective: Create a main heading (h1) with the text 'Welcome to my Page'.
levels.ai_hint_prompt: The tag for the largest heading is `<h1>`.

levels.title: Paragraph Power
levels.objective:
Below the h1, add a paragraph (`

` tag) with the text 'This is my first webpage.'
levels.starter_code: Welcome to my Page
levels.expected_output:
Welcome to my Page

This is my first webpage.
